title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break

title: Fred Grim assistant coach Ajax 1
snippet: Fred Grim has been appointed as assistant coach to the Ajax 1 technical staff. Grim (60) previously served as Head of Coaching within Ajax's youth academy.

title: Fred Grim - Wikipedia
snippet: Grim was appointed manager of a relegated FC Emmen side as a replacement of Dick Lukkien in June 2023. On 9 April 2024 FC Emmen announced that Grim was sacked with only 5 games left. Grim was named assistant to manager John Heitinga at Ajax in October 2025, only to take over Heitinga's tasks ...

title: Signs of life at Ajax: Three wins on the bounce show progress for Fred Grim | OneFootball
snippet: It means that the Eredivisie side finally have a first win in the competition, even if it likely comes too late to make it through to the next round. Yet for interim head coach Fred Grim, it shows that perhaps progress is being made at Ajax.
